name: b-ioc
description: A magic free, dirt simple IoC container for Node.

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && rm -rf _book && gitbook build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:brandonjpierce/b-ioc gh-pages --force

author: Brandon Pierce <brandon@brandonjpierce.com> (http://brandonjpierce.com)
